thread.title: Fan collapses during game, pronounced dead
thread.title_full: Fan collapses during game, pronounced dead | Sports | Saudi Gazette

author: CINCINNATI
title: Fan collapses during game, pronounced dead
text: CINCINNATI — A man from Springfield, Missouri, collapsed in a restroom at Paul Brown Stadium Sunday during an NFL game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Cincinnati Bengals and was pronounced dead at a hospital, a Bengals spokesman said. The man’s identity wasn’t released, pending notification of his family. Bengals spokesman Bob Bedinghaus said the fan had some type of pre-existing medical issue. Police and paramedics tried to revive the man at the stadium. He was taken to Christ Hospital, where he was pronounced dead, Bedinghaus said. The Bengals beat the Chiefs 36-21. — AP
